body:
The assassin kit in nexus really needs a buff. Just to make it invisible forever. The fact that you have to click redstone to turn invis, it only lasts for 5 seconds, and you have to wait like 15 seconds to use it again is kinda anoying. Im just wondering if you will buff it and when.

title: Nexus Assassin

replies.body:
Invisible forever? Nope. Personally, it's fine. You can run away or sneak attack someone.

What I would recommend is making it available to everyone and then make another donators kit around that level.
